head_commit.message:
VPN-4318 VPN-4477 - Schedule TaskProduct before showing the subscription view, if not done before (#6488)

* VPN-4318 - Scheudle TaskProduct before showing the subscription view, if not done before
* Only load Product's when needed, add a UI spinner if not yet ready
---------
Co-authored-by: Gela <gmalekpour@mozilla.com>
